import Header from "../../components/Header/Header"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer/Footer"; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Create from '../../components/CRUD/create' import axios from 'axios'; export function Cadastro(){ const [pagina,setPagina] = useState(1) const [cep, setCep] = useState(''); const [numero, setNumero] = useState(''); const [nome , setNome] = useState(''); const [idEndereco, setIdEndereco ] = useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [telefone, setTelefone] = useState(''); const handleClick = (e) => { setPagina(e) } const postEndereco = () => { axios.post(`http://localhost:8080/endereco/save/cep`, { cep, numero }) } const postCliente = () => { axios.post(`http://localhost:8080/cliente`, { nome, idEndereco, email, telefone }) } useEffect(() => { exibirPagina() }); const exibirPagina = () => { if (pagina===1){ return ( Cadastro de Endereço

setCep(e.target.value)}/>

setNumero(e.target.value)}/>
) } if (pagina===2){ return ( Cadastro de Cliente

setNome(e.target.value)}/>

setIdEndereco(e.target.value)}/>

setEmail(e.target.value)}/>

setTelefone(e.target.value)}/>
) } if (pagina===4){ return ( Cadastro de Produto











) } if (pagina===3){ return ( Cadastro de Categoria



) } } return (<>
{handleClick(1)}} href="#first">Endereco {handleClick(2)}} href="#1">Cliente {handleClick(3)}} href="#3">Categoria {handleClick(4)}} href="#2">Produto
{ exibirPagina() } {/*}
*/} ) }
